exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure (shutter speed, ND filter selection and ISO sensitivity)
exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
continuousdrive: Up to 7 shots at approx. 10 frames per second
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
movierecording: Full HD: 1920x1080p / 30fps HD: 1280x720p / 30fps iFrame 540: 960x540 / 30fps HS 1920x1080 / 15fps HS 1280x720 / 60fps HS 640x480 / 120fps Movie file format: MPEG-4 AVC H.264 VGA: 640x480 / 30fps
flashrange: [W]: 0.5 to 4.0m (1ft. 8in. to 13ft.) [T]: 1.0 to 2.0m (3 ft. 4 in. to 6 ft. 6 in.)
focallength: 4.6-27.6 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 26-156 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
scenemodes: Back Light Beach Black and White Copy Close Up Copy Dusk/Dawn Easy Panorama Fireworks Show Food Landscape Museum Night Landscape Night Portrait Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Scene Auto Selector Snow Sports Sunset 3D Photography
meteringsystem: Matrix Center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x) Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
movieformat: MOV (Video: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, Audio: AAC stereo)
shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 sec. 1/4000 sec. (maximum speed during high-speed continuous shooting) 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
normalfocusrange: [W]: Approx. 1 ft. 8 in. (50 cm.) to infinity [T]: Approx. 3 ft. 4 in. (1 m.) to infinity
digitalzoom: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 624mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
